segments.text: Have you ever been to Japan ? I'm going in the fall .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Tell me about it . What's it like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: On my first trip I went to Tokyo , and on my second trip I visited Kyoto .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you think of Tokyo ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very big and exciting , but very crowded , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I've seen pictures of the crowds !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And the restaurant are excellent ... but they're kind of expensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Kyoto is lovely . It's full of beautiful old temples and gardens.It ' s a very historic city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was in Tokyo in August , and it was really hot and humid . I went to Kyoto in October.It was hot and sunny , but there was no humidity .
segments.speaker: S2
